publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-705 Susan Deacon: Publication of Mental Welfare Commission Report—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Ministers intend to lay the Mental Welfare Commission for Scotland Report of Inquiry into the Care and Treatment of Noel Ruddle before the Parliament and orders the Clerk to publish the report.

S1M-705 Susan Deacon: Publication of Mental Welfare Commission Report—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Ministers intend to lay the Mental Welfare Commission for Scotland Report of Inquiry into the Care and Treatment of Noel Ruddle before the Parliament and orders the Clerk to publish the report.
